original_title: Depeche Mode - Tour of the Universe: Live in Lisbon
overview: Lisbon rushed in large to attend the second concert of Depeche Mode in the riverside room: three hours before the climb to the stage of the protagonists, the queue to enter the room was considerable. Depeche Mode showed, as usual, that after 29 years they still are an amazing band live.
title: Depeche Mode - Tour of the Universe: Live in Lisbon
